DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study is analyze the influence of TV entertainment in children less than 3 years of age during echocardiography in order to achieve a complete and accurate test. This is an experimental study in children with suspected congenital or acquired cardiac disease. An examination room was prepared with a TV on the ceiling that was positioned in a way that would provide unobstructed viewing for children during the echocardiography procedure.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Television Cartoons in Patients Younger Than 3.5 Years During Echocardiography
DOC.criteria: Pediatric patients who were referred to pediatric cardiology consultation. Patients younger than 3.5 years. Signed informed consent by parents. No signed informed consent by parents.
